experience.title: Online Marketing
experience.description: Market their resource, add sections to the resource and helping with advertisement and promotion so that educroc.com get an acceptance in the global platform.The idea of edgrab was born when the founders were pursuing their graduation.They had to go through a major problem of not being able to get a valid and useful study material from the best of students in every college or anywhere else.This made them decide on to do an in-depth market research , which made them realize that a student was spending a big chunk of money on either getting notes photocopied or buying them which went unused once the exams were over.

publications: [{"title":"Energy enhancement by green technology synthesis","subtitle":"West Bengal State Council of Science and Technology","date":"November 7, 2016","description":"G.CELL is basically a green cell/green battery life technology that keeps the older charging system of batteries of automotive alive but reducing the electricity usage and the wear and tear thereby caused.It panelizes a solar enabling by means of a control system arrangement fitted with a feedback path mechanism that operates on a conditional check basis ,further operated on by the signal transmission from a microprocessor unit (MPU) (working on a controlled ,active low logic) along with sensors to activate the path.It does not store any solar energy, thus no trapping is enabled which lowers the chance of any wastage or panel degradation but much like electricity transmission the energy of the light waves are directly stored after conversion into the battery which is again fed into the motor for pulling the wheels.It reduces stress on electricity and saves a higher percentage of it , thereby making the consumption on electricity go lower from electricity enabled vehicle industries.This reduces the chance of heating due to charging and discharging processes as the battery now requires a lower charging time as it is mostly fed by solar."},{"title":"ALTERNATIVE BATTERY LIFE(G.CELL)","date":"August 14, 2016","description":"Why green technology (g. cell) should be introduced to automobile immediately? Firstly , if we are considering the vehicle sectors that normally run on fuels, be petrol, diesel, and gases. The main emission are SOX and NOX. The emissions in form of gases disintegrate as separate molecules of the non metals and recombine with atmospheric moisture to become respective acids, and come down as acid rain.Secondly , if we switch for devices that are mostly electrical and electronic based , the prime attention switches to the electricity generation possible. And in that cases most of our power plants adopting the modified Rankine cycle are 38 percent efficient( involves 2 % of human error).Thirdly , the generated power cannot be stored . The signal’s voltage level is stepped up at a generating transformer and thereby through transmission lines (minimizing losses through Joule’s heat by reduced current).And in an average the vehicles which are electricity enabled consumes 48 V.Now if we can system a device that would lessen the electricity consumption, it would help in the lesser encroachment in the non renewable source, electricity which is further generated at the cost of another non renewable source, fossils.Lastly , this could be a long term impact to the economical as well as the environmental factors governing the nature."}]
projects: [{"title":"G.CELL","description":"G.CELL is basically a green cell/green battery life technology that keeps the older charging system of batteries of automotive alive but reducing the electricity usage and the wear and tear thereby caused.It panelizes a solar enabling by means of a control system arrangement fitted with a feedback path mechanism that operates on a conditional check basis ,further operated on by the signal transmission from a microprocessor unit (MPU) (working on a controlled ,active low logic) along with sensors to activate the path.It does not store any solar energy, thus no trapping is enabled which lowers the chance of any wastage or panel degradation but much like electricity transmission the energy of the light waves are directly stored after conversion into the battery which is again fed into the motor for pulling the wheels.It reduces stress on electricity and saves a higher percentage of it , thereby making the consumption on electricity go lower from electricity enabled vehicle industries.This reduces the chance of heating due to charging and discharging processes as the battery now requires a lower charging time as it is mostly fed by solar."},{},{"title":"RFID enabled attendance system"},{},{"title":"security, surveillance and automation : SMART CITY (SMART.INNOVATE)","description":"This project focus specifically on utilizing IoT devices, a WEARABLE CAPACITIVE SENSOR, various other sensors and the widely used Android Phone to develop a ‘SMART CITY’. THE purpose of this project is to connect the everyday use objects and services together and provide user-friendly platform for users to access them. It maintains a database in the security control center where-from information can be accessed. In this prototype, all the apartments and service centers of the city are synchronized and the users get a platform from where they can access them. The ‘Smart-City’ consists of the following features:- •Apartments equipped with various sensors •Control of Home Appliances over Phone, using DTMF; PASSWORD protected •RFID based entry to apartment •Emergency Services and Apartments Synchronized •Database of activities recorded for security purpose •Updates on User’s Phone or Laptop •Daily Activities Automated •Live Surveillance of Home without Loss of data •Auto Info for servicing of Appliances sent to service provider •Capacitive touch sensor Wearable Device.The entire city is connected over by IoT modules. Apartments and other service centers communicate using ESP-8266. The functioning of the ‘Smart-City’ has been categorized into THREE parts interlinked with each other. •Automation of Apartment •Synchronization of city services •Surveillance and Security of the Apartments and City. Keywords— smart city, automation, ESP, security, surveillance, DTMF, capacitive touch sensor, Wearable device"},{},{},{"title":"SMART.INNOVATE"},{},{}]
